text: Approval for the crosssail and opensail coronary dilation catheters.  These catheters are indicated for: (a) balloon dilatation of the stenotic portion of a coronary artery or bypass graft stenosis for the purpose of improving myocardial perfusion and (b) balloon dilatation of a coronary artery occlusion for the purpose of restoring coronary flow in patients with st-segment elevation myocardial infarction.
